name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Youtube progress bar back to red

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to change the background color of YouTube progress bar back to red.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Red Progress Bar changes the YouTube video progress bar to a solid red color, improving visibility and giving the player a cleaner, more vibrant look. This extension works automatically whenever a video is played, with no user data collected or shared.
